select sum(a.AUTHORITY_NO) as curAuth, sum(a.curTotalMember) as cntMem from (select AUTHORITY_NO, count(MEMBER_NO) as curTotalMember from MEMBER where MEMBER_OUTDATE is null and AUTHORITY_NO in (1, 2, 3) group by AUTHORITY_NO)a
union all
select sum(b.AUTHORITY_NO) as curAuthority, sum(b.curTotalOwner) as curTotal from (select AUTHORITY_NO, count(OWNER_NO) as curTotalOwner from OWNER where OWNER_OUTDATE is null and AUTHORITY_NO in (4, 5) group by AUTHORITY_NO)b

select sum(a.AUTHORITY_NO) as curAuth, sum(a.curTotalMember) as cntMem from (select AUTHORITY_NO, count(MEMBER_NO) as curTotalMember from MEMBER where MEMBER_OUTDATE is not null and AUTHORITY_NO in (1, 2, 3) group by AUTHORITY_NO)a
union all
select sum(b.AUTHORITY_NO) as curAuthority, sum(b.curTotalOwner) as curTotal from (select AUTHORITY_NO, count(OWNER_NO) as curTotalOwner from OWNER where OWNER_OUTDATE is not null and AUTHORITY_NO in (4, 5) group by AUTHORITY_NO)b

select a.AUTHORITY_NAME, count(o.AUTHORITY_NO) as curOwner from AUTHORITY a left join OWNER o on a.AUTHORITY_NO=o.AUTHORITY_NO where a.AUTHORITY_NO in (4, 5) and o.OWNER_OUTDATE is null group by a.AUTHORITY_NAME

select a.ADVERTISE_NAME, count(s.STORE_NO) as cntAd from STOREAD s right join ADVERTISE a on s.ADVERTISE_NO=a.ADVERTISE_NO where s.AD_PAY_FLAG='Y' and to_char(s.AD_VALIDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by a.ADVERTISE_NAME

select count(STORE_NO) as cntAdStore from STORES where STORE_NO not in (select distinct scb.STORE_NO from STORECOUPONBOX scb)
union all
select count(distinct scb.STORE_NO) as adStore from STORECOUPONBOX scb
select s.R_COUPON_NO, count(s.R_COUPON_NO) as cntRCou from STORECOUPONBOX s group by s.r_coupon_no
select count(ORDERS_NO) as countOrders, sum(ORDERS_PRICE) as sumPrice from ORDERS where to_char(ORDERS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM') and O_STATUS_NO=4

select l.L_CATEGORY_NAME, count(o.ORDERS_NO) as orderCnt from orders o left join ORDERDETAIL od on o.ORDERS_NO=od.ORDERS_NO left join MENU m on od.MENU_NO=m.MENU_NO left join STOREMENUGROUP smg on m.S_M_GROUP_NO=smg.S_M_GROUP_NO left join STORES s on smg.STORE_NO=s.STORE_NO left join LARGECATEGORY l on s.L_CATEGORY_NO=l.L_CATEGORY_NO where to_char(ORDERS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM') and O_STATUS_NO=4 group by l.L_CATEGORY_NAME

select c.G_CATEGORY_NAME, count(p.G_CATEGORY_NO) as cntCategory from GIFT g left join GIFTPRODUCT p on g.G_PRODUCT_NO=p.G_PRODUCT_NO right join GIFTCATEGORY c on p.G_CATEGORY_NO=c.G_CATEGORY_NO group by c.G_CATEGORY_NAME
select p.G_P_TYPE_PRICE, count(g.G_P_TYPE_NO)as cntPrice from GIFT g right join GIFTPRICETYPE p on g.G_P_TYPE_NO=p.G_P_TYPE_NO group by p.G_P_TYPE_PRICE

select (select g_p_type_price from giftpricetype gp where gp.g_p_type_no=g.g_p_type_no) as g_p_type_Price, (select g_product_name from giftproduct where g.g_product_no=g_product_no) as g_product_name, count(*), ( select g_category_name from giftcategory c,giftproduct p where c.G_CATEGORY_NO = p.G_CATEGORY_NO and p.G_PRODUCT_NO=g.g_product_no ) as g_category_name from gift g group by g.G_P_TYPE_NO,g.G_PRODUCT_NO
